segments.text: I was inquiring about a bill that I never got .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which credit card was the bill for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The bill was for my Master Card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That bill should have been mailed about two weeks ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It never came in the mail .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My computer shows that it has already been mailed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have not gotten my bill , so what should I do about that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should try contacting your post office .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If it is the post office's fault , may I have an extension on my bill ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'll have to prove it was their error ; then you can get an extension .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for all your help .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are very welcome . Have a good day .
segments.speaker: S2
